# textAlignment

**Instance Property**

The alignment of the text within its container.

## Declaration

```swift
var textAlignment: DocumentObservation.Container.Text.Alignment? { get }
```

## Inspecting the text

- **boundingRegion**: A polygon that defines the boundary of text.
- **DocumentObservation.Container.Text.Alignment**: The different text alignment types within a container.
